Name: Dart Around
Description: Skip the Time Passes step of the next night.

Name: Bury Deep
Description:
Remove 2 time counters.
Move two cards from your partner's field to your field.

Name: Fur Frenzy
Description: Deal 2 damage. If you have no cards in hand, also deal 1 damage to each other enemy.

Name: Nut Assault
Description: Deal X damage divided as you choose among any number of enemies, where X is half the number of cards on your field, rounded up.

Name: Fill Cheeks
Description:
Forage.
For the rest of this turn, after you discard a card, return it to your hand.
